vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_17.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_17.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Token.WithdrawToken (patch_17.sol#28-34):
	-require(bool)(_token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),_to,_amount)) patch_17.sol#33

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in TokenBank.WithdrawToHolder (patch_17.sol#67-74):
	-require(bool)(_addr.call.value(_wei)()) patch_17.sol#73

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.changeOwner (patch_17.sol#11) is not in mixedCase
